name: Steven Universe: Save the Light
description: Join the Crystal Gems on the ultimate quest! A mysterious new Gem has stolen a powerful weapon. Only Steven and his friends have what it takes to stop her. “Save the Light” is a unique RPG hybrid that combines real-time and turn-based combat.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 - 64bit Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 730 or equivalent with 1 GB VRAM Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 - 64bit Processor: Intel i5-2300 (2.8 GHz quad core) or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent with 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 9 GB available space
